sentences.en: A very sturdy chrysanthemum which resisted in two wet winters.
sentences.cn: 在两个潮湿的冬天抵抗的一朵非常茁壮的菊花.

sentences.en: An insecticide derived from a plant, e . g . pyrethrum ( from Chrysanthemum flowers ).
sentences.cn: 3来源于植物的杀虫剂, 例如除虫菊 ( 来源于菊花 ).

sentences.en: As chrysanthemum, rhododendron and walnut, such as an ominous thing.
sentences.cn: 视菊花 、 杜鹃花与核桃等为不祥之物.

sentences.en: Crimson, Chrysanthemum - flowered ; upright stems and stalks , stout branches , elliptical leaves, middle blossoming.
sentences.cn: 菊花型, 红色.颈直.柄直.叶椭圆.株形半开展, 枝条粗壮.分枝能力中. 花中期.

sentences.en: Did chrysanthemum tea drink honey what to profit there is?
sentences.cn: 蜂蜜菊花茶喝了有什么益处 啊 ?

sentences.en: Each mourner wore a black armband and a white paper chrysanthemum.
sentences.cn: 每个吊唁的人都佩带着黑纱和一朵白纸菊花.

sentences.en: He fed it chrysanthemum petals and tended to its wounds until it was strong enough to fly.
sentences.cn: 他用菊花的花瓣来喂它，还照料它的伤口，直到它康复能够飞翔。

sentences.en: Ingredients: Collagen, hyaluronic acid, chrysanthemum extract serum, arbutin etc.
sentences.cn: 成份: 胶原蛋白 、 透明质酸 、 野菊花提取液 、 熊果苷等.

sentences.en: Its ingredients include Xanthium fruit, magnolia flower, wild chrysanthemum and licorice root.
sentences.cn: 其成份包括苍耳子 、 木兰花 、 野菊花和甘草.

sentences.en: Tao Yuanming's poem which praised the autumn chrysanthemum revealed his noble character.
sentences.cn: 陶渊明咏秋菊的诗篇显示出他高洁的人格.

sentences.en: The chrysanthemum has been quick - fried away by the fence!
The chrysanthemum show is full of the beauty of autumn.
The old man potted the chrysanthemum cuttings.
sentences.cn: 老人把菊花的插枝种在花盆内.

sentences.en: The tea tasted faintly of chrysanthemum.
There are many species of chrysanthemum.
We have Oolong tea, chrysanthemum tea and green tea.
sentences.cn: 我们有乌龙茶 、 菊花茶和绿茶.

sentences.en: Why do not you get a haircut, you look like a chrysanthemum.
sentences.cn: 你为什么不去理发, 你简直像朵菊花了.

phrases.tran_cn: 菊花茶；菊花晶（茶菊花萃取物制品）
n. 野菊花，野菊花粉末

trans.tran_en: a garden plant with large brightly coloured flowers
